sections.heading: Bonds; issuance; delivery of certified transcript
sections.text: The secretary of the board of supervisors of the drainage district in which bonds are issued shall furnish a duly certified transcript to the holder of any such bond on demand.SourceLaws 1909, c. 147, ยง 10, p. 522;R.S.1913, ยง 1837;C.S.1922, ยง 1784;C.
